lore: Wielding arrays of horrific implements from their personal oubliettes and laboratories, Haemonculi drift like sinister predators in battle. They direct their Covens of twisted monstrosities and pain-adepts while hungrily seeking out fresh subjects for their hideous fleshcrafting.

otherAbilities.Master of Pain:: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.
otherAbilities.Fear Incarnate (Aura):: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, each time a Battle-shock or Leadership test is taken for that enemy unit, subtract 1 from that test.
